amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce a new regulatory action of $100 million or more.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce a new regulatory action of $100 million or more.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Duffy.
